outputs.output_descr: Management and Coordination of UNDP supported HIV/AIDS activities in Somalia. TRAC resources. Also includes resources form UNAIDS (pass-through)
Global Fund Year 1 Multisectoral Capacity Building Programme

The overall purpose for the Project is to implement several areas of the Round 8 HIV Grant specifically:
1. Service Delivery Area 1.2. which works with HIV and the mass media in Somalia
2. Service Delivery Area 3.1 which focuses on support to AIDS Commissions. UNDP will be specifically responsible for the management and strengthening of the South Central AIDS Commission (SCAC).
3. Service Delivery Area 3.2. which focuses on policy development, including workplace policy
4. Service Delivery Areas 3.3 which focuses on leadership and governance
5. Service Delivery Area 4.1 which focuses on Strategic governance

project_descr: This is a cross-cutting project whose focus is to build national capacities of government at all levels, and civil society, to support a coordinated and effective response to the HIV & AIDS epidemic.
project_title: Responding to HIV and AIDS in Somalia
